description: Creates a branch in a specified source repository in Amazon CodeCatalyst.

parameters.name: projectName
parameters.description: The name of the project in the space.

parameters.name: sourceRepositoryName
parameters.description: The name of the repository where you want to create a branch.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name for the branch you're creating.

nested_items.name: ref
nested_items.description: The Git reference name of the branch.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the newly created branch.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The time the branch was last updated, in coordinated universal time (UTC) timestamp format as specified in RFC 3339.

nested_items.name: headCommitId
nested_items.description: The commit ID of the tip of the newly created branch.
